sentences.en: A joint algorithm is proposed based on cyclic prefix and virtual carriers.
sentences.cn: 提出了一种基于循环前缀和虚载波的联合算法.

sentences.en: Methods Hertzian contact response of feldspathic dental porcelain to cyclic fatigue.
sentences.cn: 目的比较两种最大载荷值下牙科脆性陶瓷赫兹触压循环疲劳损伤模式.

sentences.en: Repeat but use left cyclic instead of right cyclic.
sentences.cn: 重覆以上的动作,但是将副翼打左舵.

sentences.en: Similar cyclic stresses may have occurred due to wind - induced swaying motion during storage.
sentences.cn: 同样在存放时由风力引起的横向摆动也可以产生类似的循环应力.

sentences.en: The cyclic model of the universe is clearly attractive.
sentences.cn: 宇宙的循环模式显然富有魅力.

sentences.en: The estimation for harmonic numbers based on order cyclic - moments are presented.
sentences.cn: 在此基础上,提出了谐波分量个数的估计方法.

sentences.en: The Mechanical properties of glass fiber filament yarn stressunder a cyclic load.
sentences.cn: 本文对玻璃纤维长丝纱的机械性能做了较全面的讨论.

sentences.en: The object is no longer in cyclic motion.
sentences.cn: 这物体已不再循环运动。

sentences.en: The priciple of cyclic sedimentation applies to deposits dating from earliest Paleozoic time to the Holocene.
sentences.cn: 旋回沉积原理适用于始于最早的古生代迄至全新世的沉积物.

sentences.en: The refrigerant in a household refrigerator also undergoes a cyclic process.
sentences.cn: 家用冰箱的致冷剂,也经历循环过程.

sentences.en: The relations reflect the nature of the tectonic movement, that is, gradual or cyclic.
sentences.cn: 这些关系反映出构造运动的性质, 是渐进的或是旋回的.

sentences.en: The thermal fatigue resistance cuts down thermal cyclic upper temperature rising.
sentences.cn: 随热循环上限温度升高,其热疲劳抗力降低.

sentences.en: The unsaturated link occurs in a cyclic system.
sentences.cn: 在环体系中存在不饱和键.

sentences.en: These cyclic sequences are overlain by the lagoon dolomitic mudstones and shales.
sentences.cn: 米级旋回层序之顶覆以厚度不等的?
